Texts.Chs: 好极了。现在，我再也不用担心靠近那些会随时发狂的野生动物了。这里是一些资源和像素，全都给你。
Texts.Eng: Fantastic. Now I will feel somewhat less terror-stricken at the mere thought of being near wildlife. Here's some resources you can probably use, and some cash.

Texts.Chs: 老实说，作为一名工程师我有些胆小，因为我很快就要外出探险了，不过谁也不能保证不会遇到危险的动物，对吧？正因为如此，我才会需要一把^orange;激光手枪^reset;来防身，但我不知道如何制作它。你能为我^green;制作一把^reset;吗？
Texts.Eng: I'll be honest, I am a horribly bad engineer. I'm heading on an expedition soon and need a ^orange;Laser Pistol^reset; but don't know how to make one. Could you ^green;make me one and bring it to me^reset;?
